DataElement.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement Tried or Currently Used Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the medication or device not previously mentioned that they have tried or currently use to improve erections, using a descriptive text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement Other Medicine or Device Tried or Currently Used to Improve Erection
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A component of the EPIC designed to assess the use of erectile aids among patients treated for prostate cancer._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A question about which medicine or device an individual uses or has used to improve an erection.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite, Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A component of the EPIC designed to assess the use of erectile aids among patients treated for prostate cancer.

Concepts.longName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite, Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement
Concepts.definition: A component of the EPIC designed to assess the use of erectile aids among patients treated for prostate cancer.
